text:
This is it. AI can finally make infographic.

Here's exactly how with Nano Banana 2:

1. Go to Gemini.
2. Click on “Tools” + “Create images”.
3. Or simply click at the top on “Try it”.
4. Type any prompt or copy-paste mine:

Prompt: “Make an infographic that shows [topic]”

For more prompts & my favorite use cases: https://lnkd.in/dkhzGdFZ



PS: I write a newsletter to 162,000+ readers.

Join us for free at how-to-ai.guide.
